title: Christmas Yule log
ingredients: ['125g caster sugar', '4 eggs, separated', '60g butter, softened', '100g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 tablespoon lukewarm water', '1 pinch salt', 'Chocolate buttercream', '150g butter, softened', '200g icing sugar', '100g plain chocolate, chopped', 'unsweetened cocoa powder, for dusting']
